directions: Place the uncooked pasta in the bottom of a 3.5 quart slow cooker that has been sprayed with cooking spray. Add the remaining ingredients, except tomatoes, to the slow cooker and stir until well combined. Cook on LOW for 4 hours.
Just before serving add tomatoes; stir to combine.
ingredients: 2 cups macaroni or pasta of choice, uncooked
1 (10 ounce) can RED GOLD® Petite Diced Tomatoes & Green Chilies, drained
title: Slow Cooker Macaroni and Cheese
